title: Testlab
extract: In Testlab, requirements can be anything that can be used to specify, define or qualify features and functionality for the product, service or an application under testing. ... When test cases are executed they are always executed in a test run.
extract_html: In Testlab, requirements can be anything that can be used to specify, define or qualify features and functionality for the product, service or an application under testing. ... When test cases are executed they are always executed in a test run.
